title: BATTLE OF ALJUBARROTA (1385AD) - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Mod Gameplay
description:
BATTLE OF ALJUBARRTOA (1835) - Medieval Kingdoms Total War 1212AD Mod Gameplay - On the 14th of August 1385 John of Portugal met John of Castile in central Portugal. The fate of Portuguese independence will be decided right here on the battlefield! Enjoy the battle! 

JOIN MY DISCORD SERVER: https://discord.gg/JjR7UR3

If you enjoyed the video don't forget to Like and Leave a comment :D
